name: Cleaning Simulator (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: Cleaning Simulator (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
By Georgiy R. and Justyce W.

You are a robot that has lots of work to do! Rub the floor to make sure it’s all clean!

Controls: Arrow keys to move, “X” to grab or hold, “C” to mop the floor. Finish cleaning all the dirty floor tiles to win!
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
